message: Join us for Sunday Worship Service at 10 AM. All are welcome!
Our annual community outreach is on September 15th. Sign up in the lobby.
Bible Study on Wednesdays at 7 PM. This week's topic: Faith and Works.
Volunteer Appreciation Dinner on October 20th. RSVP by October 15th.
Youth Group meets every Friday at 6 PM. Come for fellowship and fun!
Thanksgiving Food Drive starts next week. Bring non-perishable items to church.
Men's Prayer Breakfast on Saturday, September 30th at 8 AM.
Women's Retreat registration is open. Early bird discount ends October 1st.
Join us for a special Christmas Eve service on December 24th at 7 PM.
New members class starts on the first Sunday of every month. Register online.
